name: John Doe
headline: Software Engineer | 5+ Years Experience | Cloud & Backend Specialist
summary: Experienced in designing and developing scalable backend applications.
Proficient in Python, JavaScript, and Go with expertise in cloud platforms like AWS and GCP.
Passionate about DevOps, CI/CD automation, and system architecture.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed microservices for high-traffic applications, handling over 1M requests/day.
Implemented API gateway using Kong for service communication and authentication.
Optimized database queries, reducing response time by 30%.

Key Achievements: Led the migration from a monolithic system to microservices architecture.
Automated infrastructure provisioning with Terraform and Kubernetes.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed RESTful APIs using FastAPI and Express.js.
Integrated payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) for seamless transactions.
Implemented caching strategies with Redis for improved performance.

Product Impact: Built a real-time notification system using WebSockets and RabbitMQ.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
